data.title: The Ultimate List of Movie Genres in Spanish
data.meta_description: What's your favorite movie genre? Check out this blog post with all the movie genres in Spanish and talk about your favorite movies!
data.text:
What are your favorite movie genres?

Movie genres are identifiable categories of films, such as action, comedy, and drama. Genres provide structure for the script, production, direction, casting, and more.

Watching films is a wonderful way to spend quality time with family, friends, or yourself!

And learning about movie genres in Spanish makes watching films in Spanish the next logical step.

Keep reading for the ultimate list of movie genres in Spanish so you can talk with your friends and family about movies in Spanish like a total pro. Grab some popcorn, and let’s begin!

Movie Genres in Spanish

Learning los géneros de películas (“movie genres”) in Spanish is an excellent way to choose what to watch on your next movie night.

Movie genre classification began at the end of the silent era, and many films are hybrids of multiple genres.The most common movie genres include western, horror, comedies and action-adventure, musicals, and science fiction.

Now that you have an idea on how the classification of movies began, is time for the list of movie genres in Spanish!

Ready? Set. Action!

1. Acción – Action

The action movie genre includes high energy films with lots of action (hence the name), in the form of races, rescues, battles, martial arts, or mountaineering. They often involve disasters, fights, escapes, and crime.

Subgenres

Action-comedy

Action-horror

Action-thriller

Disaster film

Martial arts

Science fiction-action

Spy film

Swashbuckler film

Iconic Action Movies

007: Licencia Para Matar – Licence To Kill

Kung Fu Panda

Matrix

Missión Imposible

El subgénero de Gangster – The Gangster Subgenre

Crime and gangster movies are a popular subgenre of action films developed around the sinister actions of criminals, gangsters, and hoodlums.

This category of films includes gangster, detective/mystery films, thrillers, and police films. Here’s a list of gangster films that will have you at the edge of your seat:

El Padrino – The Godfather

El Irlandes – The Irishman

Bonnie y Clyde

Tiempos Violentos – Pulp Fiction

2. Aventura – Adventure

The adventure movie genre features films that tell exciting stories. It’s similar to the action genre, as both are designed to provide an experience full of action and energy.

Contrary to action films, which tend to center on violence and conflict, adventure movies focus on conquest and exploration, creation of empires, journeys, and the struggles and situations the protagonist must confront for growth.

Subgenres

Pirate films

Swashbuckler films

Classic Adventure Movies

La máscara del Zorro – The Mask of Zorro

Apocalypto

El Conde de Monte Cristo – The Count of Monte Cristo

Everest

3. Comedia – Comedy

The comedy movie genre that is designed to make us laugh. Comedies are crafted to amuse, entertain, and be enjoyed by the public. Comedy often exaggerates situations, language, action and characters. This movie genre usually has a happy ending, although the humor can be dark.

Subgenres

Comedy of ideas

Comedy of manners

Black comedy

Farce

Parody

Situational comedy

Slapstick

Surreal comedy

Action-comedy

Comedy-thriller

Dramedy (dramatic comedy)

Excellent Comedy Movies

Shrek

Los caballeros de la mesa cuadrada y sus locos seguidores/Monty Python y los caballeros de la mesa cuadrada – Monty Python and the Holy Grail

Las Locuras de Dick y Jane/ Dick y Jane: Ladrones de Risa – Fun with Dick and Jane

El jovencito Frankenstein – Young Frankenstein

4. Dramático – Drama

The drama movie genre encompasses films that presentation serious stories with realistic characters, settings, and situations.

Subgenres

Legal Drama

Medical Drama

Melodrama

Political Drama

Docudrama

Teen Drama

Must-See Dramas

Talentos Ocultos/Figuras Ocultas – Hidden Figures

Lejos del Cielo/Lejos del Paraíso – Far From Heaven

La vida de Pi/Una aventura extraordinaria – Life of Pi

Carol

5. Histórico – Historical

This movie genre takes an historical or imagined event with a mythic, legendary, or heroic figure and adds extravagant settings and lavish costumes, with grandeur and spectacle. These films recreate past events, making this movie genre is one of the most expensive to produce.

Subgenres

Alternate history

Biopic

Epic

Historical fiction

Period piece

Recommended Historical Films

Baahubali: El Principio – Baahubali: The Beginning

300

Danza con Lobos – Dancing with Wolves

La Princesa Mononoke (1997)

6. Terror – Horror

The films in this genre are designed to frighten the audience by causing panic, dread, and alarm. Horror movies are scary for the sole purpose of entertainment, and they prey on viewers’ fears.

Subgenres

Psychological horror

Slasher

Found footage

Monster horror

Paranormal horror

Comedy horror

Classic Horror Movies

La Cosa – The Thing

Noroi: la maldición – Noroi: The Curse

Anaconda

La masacre de Texas – The Texas Chainsaw Massacre

7. Musical – Musical

Musical and dance films are cinematic creations that emphasize and showcase full-scale song and dance productions. Musical and/or dance performances are part of the narrative.

Subgenres

Animated Musical

Ballet

Dance film

Film opera

Musical fantasy

Musical romance

Operetta

Rock musical

Amazing Musical Films

En el Bosque – Into the Woods

La bailarina – The Dancer

August Rush: Escucha tu Camino – August Rush

Ballet 422

8. Ciencia Ficción – Science Fiction

Sci-fi movies are usually visionary and highly imaginative. They involve surreal or dystopian settings, with expert production designs, advanced technology, scientific developments and state-of-the-art special effects.

Subgenres

Dystopian

Apocalyptic

Tech noir

Utopian

Space opera

Super Sci-Fi Movies

Ella – Her

Titanes del Pacífico – Pacific Rim

Donni Darko

Ataque Extraterrestre – Attack the Block

9. De Vaqueros – Western

The Western genre is casually called de vaqueros (“of cowboys”). This movie genre is considered “nostalgic” for it’s themes. It’s one of the oldest, most enduring and flexible movie genres.

Subgenres

Epic Western

Revisionist Western

Spaghetti Western

Wonderful Westerns

Rango

El Asesinato de Jesse James por el cobarde Robert Ford – The Assasination of Jesse James by the coward Robert Ford

Django sin cadenas/Django desencadenado – Django Unchained

Los Siete Magníficos – The Magnificent Seven

How Talk About Your Favorite Movie Genre in Spanish

Talking about movies is a great ice-breaker for a conversation! So, how do you do it in Spanish?

Here’s a list of useful vocabulary words you can use when talking about movie genres.

Example Sentences

¿Qué género de películas te gusta más?

What movie genre do you like most?

¡A mi me encantan las de vaqueros!

I love Westerns!

Mis películas favoritas son las de ciencia ficción.

My favorite movies are the sci-fi ones.

El género favorito de mi hermana es el de comedia.

My sister’s favorite genre is comedy.

A no me gustan las películas de terror para nada.

I don’t like horror movies at all.
